meanings.definition: A thing that is helpful or beneficial.
meanings.sent1: The kind neighbor offered many boons to help with the garden.
meanings.sent2: The extra time off work was a great boon for her to relax.
meanings.sent3: Finding a four-leaf clover was a lucky boon for the young girl.
meanings.sent4: The unexpected promotion at work was a boon that lifted his spirits.
meanings.sent5: The clear instructions were a boon, making the project easy to complete.

meanings.sent1: She asked for a small boon of borrowing a book from the library.
meanings.sent2: Granting her request for a day off was a kind boon from the boss.
meanings.sent3: The genie granted three wishes as a magical boon to the lucky man.
meanings.sent4: Receiving a scholarship was a boon that opened doors for her future.
meanings.sent5: The unexpected gift from a friend was a delightful boon on a gloomy day.
